titles.title: To continue coverage of custodial care under the military health care system for certain individuals during fiscal year 2000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 11/9/1999--Introduced. Amends the Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2000 to provide that any person who received custodial care provided by and financed under the military health care system's case management program during FY 1999 shall continue to be eligible for such care during the period beginning on July 1, 1999, and ending on September 30, 2000.
